reviews.title: Everything
reviews.body: Worth investing absolutely love the user friendly features, camera and video quality.

reviews.title: Buy Only if Coming from iPhone 13 or earlier
reviews.body:
I‚Äôve upgraded from the iPhone 15 to the iPhone 16 Pro, and here are my thoughts:

Camera: The rear camera has noticeable improvements, offering better photo quality and enhanced details. However, the front camera remains the same as the iPhone 15.

Battery Life: No significant changes in battery performance compared to the iPhone 15.

Design & Build: The new titanium body feels premium and sturdy in hand.

Display: The screen is excellent, but when using a case, the difference in display quality between the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 15 becomes less discernible.

If you own an iPhone 15, this upgrade may not offer enough to justify the switch. However, if you have an iPhone 13 or older, the iPhone 16 Pro is a substantial upgrade worth considering.

reviews.title: Smooth purchase, minor hiccups with the trade in.
reviews.body:
The delivery person seemed a little cranky and kinda rude through out the old phone trade-in process. The rest of the experience otherwise was great.
The package arrived in a good condition. I was skeptical about making a major purchase off of Amazon but phew, it just all happened without any issues.
Worth the upgrade if going from iPhone 13 or older, cause there‚Äôs a lot of changes from the previous slightly older models.
The battery initially seemed to be draining pretty fast, but once I updated the phone to the latest ios somehow the battery life got better. Not sure if it‚Äôs with all the iPhones, just an observation from my side.

reviews.title: Great phone but poor customer service of seller
reviews.body: Its been almost 3 weeks and I am yet to get proper invoice from seller. The invoice do not carry any serial no. of phone and looks more of a scam. Please do not buy if seller cannot fix this basic thing.

reviews.title: A Sleek Upgrade Experience
reviews.body:
I was actually hesitant to order an iPhone from Amazon because there have been instances where the product wasn‚Äôt genuine. However, I was finally relieved to see that the package was genuine, and the iPhone itself was the real deal. üòÇ

I ordered the black model, and the color is sleek. I love it! üñ§

If you‚Äôre coming from an older iPhone model like the 13 Pro or earlier, or if you‚Äôre new to the Apple ecosystem, this is a great upgrade. However, I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth upgrading from an iPhone 15 Pro if you‚Äôre a casual user. There‚Äôs not much of a difference between the two, except that you‚Äôll be holding the latest iPhone. üòâ

reviews.title: Best iPhone with pro camera button
reviews.body:
It‚Äôs good to upgrade. Battery life good till evening. Camera button is more useful if I set it for zooming.

Side button for silent mode is too close to volume button that, sometimes, pressed accidentally for increasing volume. It‚Äôll take time to use to.

reviews.title: Not so impressive as 1st an iPhone.
reviews.body:
This is my 1st iPhone and I switched from samsung S20 FE. I‚Äôm writing this review/observations after the usage of 1 month.

After paying 1.3 lac you will get
1. A Palm Heater. You just start using the camera even for short duration it will get heated significantly. Or You do something intensive task like insta reel edit/upload, erase object from photos (when i used this feature phone got crashed and rebooted). I was in impression that okay it will feel warm before purchasing. But it‚Äôs a heater that will be felt at frame as well as back.
2. A genius camera button jisko apni existance kyun hai, Pata nahi. I used this button only when i need to shoot immediately but while shooting in portrait display mode it will zoom in/out accidentally because of this button touch sensitivity which results in quality of photo.
3.Ceramic glass is kachchi kali for scratches. It got so many scratches in 1 month usage not major but i was taking care but still it got.
4. Glitches in UI. Okay android companies making so many products in so may have difficulty to maintain bug free UI. But my samsung phone was superior in UI management.
5. Placements of volume and lock buttons. So many times it has taken screenshots while operating volume buttons as other this lock button will get pressed to hold/generate the pressure.

My desires for a phone was the great camera system and in that it‚Äôs performing well but expectations versus reality m kahin na kahin maza nahi aaya.

pros: Better battery life than previous models
cons: Lack of significant improvements in battery life compared to previous models
Potential heating issues during intensive tasks
Sensitive camera button causing accidental zooming
summary: The iPhone 16 Pro offers good quality and better battery life compared to previous models, with user-friendly features and enhanced camera and video quality.
The premium design and build of the phone is commendable, but users may face heating issues during video recording and potential battery drain problems initially.
While the phone is a substantial upgrade from older models, it may not justify the switch from the iPhone 15 Pro for casual users.
Some users have reported issues with heating during intensive tasks and accidental zooming due to the sensitive camera button.
Overall, the iPhone 16 Pro is a great choice for those looking to upgrade from older models, offering improvements in battery life, camera quality, and performance.
